description:
Summary score for the PROMIS Sleep-Related Impairment instrument, which measures perceptions of alertness, sleepiness, and tiredness during usual waking hours, and the perceived functional impairments during wakefulness associated with sleep problems or impaired alertness.

Each item ranges from 1 to 5. The raw score is the sum of 8 items, higher scores indicate more severe sleep related impairment and the T-score is identified by looking up total raw score in a T-score table. [Yu L et al, 2012 (PMID: 22250775)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3261577/)
